entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Sunday 9 April 2023
